title: on me by section 2(3) of the Children (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 6 of 2021),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Children (Amendment) Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Children (Amendment) Act 2021 

(Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited child (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: on me by section 2(3) of the Children (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 6 of 2021),
heading: 2. The 7th day of May 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Children
text_raw:
2. The 7th day of May 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Children 

(Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 6 of 2021) comes into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 April, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [199] 3
